meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bogus or counterfeit.
meanings.sent1: The bogusnesses of the fake painting were quickly discovered.
meanings.sent2: She was upset by the bogusnesses of the designer handbag she bought online.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the bogusnesses of his magic tricks, making the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The bogusnesses of the politician's promises were exposed during the debate.
meanings.sent5: The detective was skilled at uncovering the bogusnesses in forged documents.

meanings.definition: Instances of something being fake or fraudulent.
meanings.sent1: The market was flooded with bogusnesses, deceiving many customers.
meanings.sent2: He was caught selling bogusnesses like fake watches on the street corner.
meanings.sent3: The bogusnesses of the online reviews made it hard to trust the product.
meanings.sent4: The scam artist specialized in creating elaborate bogusnesses to trick people.
meanings.sent5: The museum had to remove the bogusnesses from its collection to maintain its reputation.
